title: philipma1957
author: philipma1957
content: Morgan's were 1878 to 1904 and 1921Peace were 1921 to 1928 and 1934 to 1935.I could use about 50 of them.I can pay BTC, LTC, Doge or PayPal I live in New Jersey.If I know you well I can pay first.If we have not done a deal you can send first.I would like at least 5 or more if you have some.They can be older or beat up culls .here is a roll on eBay https://www.ebay.com/itm/374897799803?Anyone have something like it.

comments.author: polymerbit
comments.body: Your best bet is probably APMEX. Since the pandemic, prices of even the lowest grade Morgans & Peace dollars have gone up.Alot of people are hoarding silver coins. I've seen LCS in the states (MAY 2023) ask over 40% premium above spot on junk. Somewhat unrelated, but Morgan dollars were never traditionally rolled. They came in bags. Anyone who tries to sell you a roll with a nice ender on it is most likely a bad deal. To anyone thinking of selling, know your mint marks (such as CC, O, S). They can carry a substantial numismatic premium.

Since the pandemic, prices of even the lowest grade Morgans & Peace dollars have gone up.Alot of people are hoarding silver coins. I've seen LCS in the states (MAY 2023) ask over 40% premium above spot on junk. Somewhat unrelated, but Morgan dollars were never traditionally rolled. They came in bags. Anyone who tries to sell you a roll with a nice ender on it is most likely a bad deal. To anyone thinking of selling, know your mint marks (such as CC, O, S). They can carry a substantial numismatic premium. Its why I look  for culls or VG at best.I want 1000 silver dimes -------- I have 100 400 silver quarters ------ I have   40 200 half dollars ---------- I have  40 100 dollars --------------- I have 50100 1 oz rounds --------- I have 10100 1 oz bars ------------ I have 20  20 5 oz bars ------------ I have 17  10 10 oz bars ---------- I have 8 or 9    3 kilos ---------------- I have 0 and likely will wait on theseS I post here and look to see if anyone wants to sell some

comments.author: Gatorelf
comments.body: Hi, I buy and or sell Morgans/Peace regularly on ebay still (as Gatorelf) after 25 years. I haven't found a better place considering so many reputable dealers have accounts there as well as individuals will from time to time sell off a portion of their long time unsearched old collection. The goin price lately is $30 to 32 for Morgan cull bullion coins and or just some low grade coins. Just five or so years ago you could buy them anywhere at $17 and in VF condition. There has been a nice five year upward trend ( following silver price) across the board on Morgans/Peace especially for higher grade numismatic values. Nothing like 1990 when most coins were peaking from demand but still a really nice rebound from the lows of 5/6 years ago. For silver stacking and or .999 hoarding 1 ounce rounds you still get more bang for the buck with generic silvers rather than the premium Eagles.  Here is a good video on why, good luck !https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aC3UuxE23Lw&ab_channel=SilverSeeker
